11.eng-name: The Rites of Hajj (Kitab Al-Manasik Wa'l-Hajj)

hadiths.text: Abdullah ibn Malik said:I offered three rak'ahs of the sunset prayer and two rak'ahs of the night prayer along with Ibn Umar. Thereupon Malik ibn al-Harith said: What is this prayer? He said: I offered these prayers along with the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) in this place with a single iqamah
